ch0242_00_masaru/0101_0701_02_10:
Can I come along as well? I wanna study how
you battle!
ch0242_00_masaru/7101_0701_01_10:
Pasio is built just like a natural island, so I couldn’t
believe it was artificial at first.
ch0242_00_masaru/7101_0701_02_10:
I wonder how they made such large mountains
and wide forests.
ch0242_00_masaru/7102_0701_01_10:
This bag is a hand-me-down from my dad! It’s
nice and chic, right?
ch0242_00_masaru/7102_0701_02_10:
But I saw it being sold in a place called Wyndon,
which is a city in Galar.
ch0242_00_masaru/7102_0701_03_10:
It may have been the same bag, but for me, my
dad’s bag is my number-one treasure.
ch0242_00_masaru/7103_0701_02_10:
I recommend the curry with the Smoke-Poke Tail.
It’s tasty and very nutritious!
ch0242_00_masaru/7103_0701_03_10:
Apparently it’s made from Slowpoke tails, but
they’re able to grow new ones if they fall off!
ch0242_00_masaru/7104_0701_01_10:
When you’re in a meadow and the wind blows,
the grass and trees make a gentle rustling
sound, right?
ch0242_00_masaru/7104_0701_02_10: It feels just like the pastures back in Postwick...
ch0242_00_masaru/7104_0701_03_10: So sometimes, I just stand still and close my eyes.
ch0242_00_masaru/7105_0701_01_10: My goal is to be like Leon! He’s also my rival!
ch0242_00_masaru/7105_0701_02_10:
And you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
You’re my goal AND my rival!
ch0242_00_masaru/7105_0701_03_10:
Hang on a minute. That’s exactly what I just said
for Leon!
ch0242_00_masaru/1701_0701_01_10: Here, have a present! I think you’ll like it!
ch0242_00_masaru/2501_0701_01_10:
There are many different types of relationships
between people. There’s family, mentors,
students, masters...
ch0242_00_masaru/2501_0701_02_10:
But there’s something special about my
peers. I feel like we’re equals.
ch0242_00_masaru/2501_0701_03_10:
We went to the same Gyms at the same time, so I
definitely don’t want to lose to them!
ch0242_00_masaru/2501_0702_01_10:
When Hop said he wanted to become a Pokémon
Professor, I genuinely wanted to support him.
ch0242_00_masaru/2501_0702_02_10:
Everyone chooses their own path and has to keep
on moving.
ch0242_00_masaru/2511_0701_01_10: I used to live in a little town called Postwick.
ch0242_00_masaru/2511_0701_02_10:
So it was a great experience to fly out of there
and go on an adventure around Galar.
ch0242_00_masaru/2511_0702_01_10:
I discovered the joy of traveling, and I was able to
grow with the help of many people.
ch0242_00_masaru/2511_0702_02_10: So now it’s my turn to help someone.
ch0242_00_masaru/2511_0702_03_10:
Then that someone will help someone
else, and...
ch0242_00_masaru/2511_0702_04_10: I think that’s how the world goes round.
ch0242_00_masaru/3001_0701_01_10:
I’m a morning person. I used to get up early
to explore the Wild Area back home all the time.
ch0242_00_masaru/3003_0701_01_10:
Here’s the secret to making the best curry ever:
don’t over-fan the flames! And when you start
mixing, do it nice and slow!
ch0242_00_masaru/3005_0701_01_10:
I like camping out at night in my tent. Looking up
at the night sky sends me right to sleep.
